name: View the Withdrawal Notice for an NSC and Account where customer has decided to automatically withdraw

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I view the Withdrawal Notice on the following NSC and Account:
| nsc | account |
| 932361 | 07711028 |
Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following Withdrawal Notice should be returned
| amountAvailableToWithdraw | fundsAvailableStartDate | closureNoticeRecieved | designatedWithdrawalNsc | designatedWithdrawalAccountNumber | fundsAvailableEndDate |
| 10.12 | 2015-11-18 | false | 932361 | 05144016 | 2015-11-19 |

children.description: Validate withdrawal notice: | amountAvailableToWithdraw | fundsAvailableStartDate | closureNoticeRecieved | designatedWithdrawalNsc | designatedWithdrawalAccountNumber | fundsAvailableEndDate | | 10.12 | 2015-11-18 | false | 932361 | 05144016 | 2015-11-19 |

title: View the Withdrawal Notice for an NSC and Account where customer has decided to automatically withdraw
